about_the_game:
Trakonius is an Action-Roguelike wargame set in the gladiatorial arenas of Ancient Rome. You can make offerings to the gods and gain permanent powers, spend the gold you earn as you fight in the blacksmith, and fight with different weapons you choose at the start. Each weapon has its own combat style, and with power-ups, you can fight with different strategies. Leaving the arenas victorious will earn you your freedom.

Battle Style



Trakonius must always be careful in battle. Since he often fights with more than one person, he may be subjected to several attacks at the same time. He must use the skills he has acquired and the skills he already possesses to defeat his opponents. Of course, at the right time, Dodge and Parry can significantly turn the tide of battle. Just like in a real battle, split-second decisions are very important. Because enemies will look for your vulnerability and want to attack at your weakest moment.

Character Progress



Trakonius can improve himself in different ways during his journey in the arena. When he offers his blood as an offering to the gods, he gains permanent powers from them, such as basic attack power, cooldown reduction, attack speed, when he gives the coins he earns from fighting to the blacksmith, his attack or armor improves, and by fighting in the arena, he gains experience and godly powers along with the gladiator spirits.

Story



Trakonius, a respected and beloved Roman commander, succumbed to the false intrigues of the senate and was sent to the arena to die. Trakonius, who started to fight in the arena in the name of justice, had only one way to win his own freedom, to leave all the arenas with victory... On the other hand, he was completely unaware of the prophecy that would haunt him because of his lineage...

Features



  • Combat in an isometric style, similar to the isometric style, with an overhead view camera angle.
  • Different combat experiences with 3 melee weapons in different styles.
  • With the help of the gods, start stronger with each new attempt with permanent power-ups earned from the altar.
  • Upgrade your armor or attack power at the blacksmith with the gold you earn from the great battle presented to the audience.
  • Different temporary power-ups make each trial a different experience.
  • Using battle mechanics at the right time is the key to victory. Always be careful!
  • Challenging battles against bosses with different battle styles.
  • Play over and over again with different power-ups, weapons and strategies.

short_description: A gladiator fighting for his freedom in the sands of the arena... Unaware of the prophecy, Trakonius has fallen into the arena through the machinations of the senate. Even the gods will help him in his tough battle for freedom in the name of justice, but still can he win his freedom?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Turkish
